column3: In my opinion, this is the finest Rapha film.
So really nice relax and enjoy the ride wonderful seeing
The Raphael continental videos inspired me to ride more, they made me fall in love with the sport.  The videos captured the raw essence of cycling. I love them and wish they would come back.
A very special way, to live cycling, no races, no time trials, just ride with your friends!!!
You don't need a gravel bike for road aventure!
The Rapha Continental videos got me back in to cycling after 25 years off the bike. They will forever be my inspiration. Thank you!
